data.eml:eml: A new species of Urothrips (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripidae) from canopy of monsoon forest in China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lu, Wenmin, Wang, Jun (2019): A new species of Urothrips (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripidae) from canopy of monsoon forest in China. Zootaxa 4614 (1): 191-194, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4614.1.11
